column2:
"My teacher said I am excellent
at analyzing, so I should look into more
info."

"I'm a bit slow, so this is the
first time I've been praised by someone... Thanks to you."

"So, um...this time I chose
my own topic.
Could you help me again?"

"This first one is about the boost
enemy, Fordran, found in the
Caverns. I'm counting on you."
